title: Calling Out
description: Student speaks without being called on or outside of turn.
strategies: Use a non-verbal cue (pause, hand signal).
Restate the expectation for hand up / wait time.

title: Low Engagement
description: Students are off-task, bored, or not participating.
strategies: Use pair-share or quick turn & talk.
Add movement or a quick change in modality (visuals, manipulatives).
Connect to interests and set a short, specific goal.

title: Transition Noise
description: Class is noisy during activity switches or pack-up.
strategies: Pre-teach a simple 3-step routine with a timer.
Use a countdown and positive narration of students meeting expectations.
Reset and retry brief parts of the transition if needed.
